Description: Find mug on countertop. Walk over to the coffeemachine placing mug inside. Turn on the coffeemachine.

Locate dirty plates in room. Pick up dirty plates. Carry plates to sink. Locate dirty bowls in room. Pick up dirty bowls. Carry bowls to sink. Turn on faucet. Fill sinkbasin with water. Add some contents of soapbottle into water. Place dirty plates in soapy water. Place dirty bowls in soapy water. Use dishsponge to clean plates. Place plates by sink to dry. Use dishsponge to clean bowls. Place bowls by sink to dry.
Locate apple in room. Locate knife. Use knife to slice apple.
Locate bread in room. Locate knife in room. Use knife to slice bread. Carry slice of bread to toaster. Place break into toaster. Toast bread to desired doneness.
Locate egg. Pick up egg. Carry egg to stove. Locate pan. Place pan on stove. Turn on gasburner. Crack egg into pan. Fry egg to desired doneness.

Locate tomato in room. Locate knife in room. Use knife to cut tomato into chunks. Locate pot. Place tomato chunks into pot. Carry pot to sink. Place pot under faucet. Turn on faucet and fill pot with water. Carry pot to stove. Place pot on stove. Turn on gasburner. Use spoon to stir contents of pot occasionally. Cook to desired doneness.

Find lettuce and a pot. Tear lettuce and place into pot. Fill pot with water at the sink by turning on the faucet. Find the saltshaker and peppershaker and shake them over the pot. Place pot on the stoveknobrange and turn on the gasburner. Find spoon on countertop. Stir pot.
Locate pot in room. Carry pot to sink. Place pot under faucet. Turn on faucet. Fill pot with water. Carry pot to stove. Place pot on stove. Turn on gasburner. Heat water to boiling.
Take the cracked egg over to the bin. Place cracked egg into the bin.
GO TO THE KITCHEN .TAKE ALL WANTED THINGS FROM THE FRIDGE .NOW CLEAR THE FRIDGE
I’d put the potato in my bowl and place in the microwave.
I’d grab my cup, tip the wine and pour it in.
I’d get my egg and lettuce, and put them in my fridge.
Get my cup, turn the faucet on at my sink and fill it with water.
I’d boil water, and drop my potatoes in and cook on the stove.
I’d get the unused slices from my paper towel and throw it all away.
I’d put my spoon, butter knife, fork and spatula in the drawer.

Locate television in room. Walk to television. Turn television on. Pick up remote. Use remote to switch to desired television station. Sit in armchair to watch television.
